caption.p: Time-kill curve: Plotted against X-axis and Y-axis with X-axis showing – number of microorganisms and Y-axis showing time (in min). Pg – Porphyromonas gingivalis; Pi – Prevotella intermedia; Fn – Fusobacterium nucleatum; Aa – Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans; NG – No growth; Min – Minutes; Hrs – Hours
